title: Rescue witch & monster puzzle Download
text: Help the little witch get the naughty monster go to thier home! Challenging and addictive of match-3 puzzle game, an endless fun and absolutely free to play!Features:- With over 120+ puzzles of match-3 games and many interesting levels- Easy to play but hard to become a monster legend and reach the 3 stars for each level- Colorful Easter egg and lovely with emotion and personality- The monster crush with your finger, and enjoy monster splash- Stunning graphics and special effects!- Share scores on Facebook with friendsHow to play:- Switch and crush 3 monster or more- Crush 4 monster in a line to create lighting thunder- Crush 5 monster frenzy with T or L shape to create bomb- Crush 5 monster frenzy in a line to create color monsterRescue witch will give you hours of fun. Thank you for play and pick our game!
